results.description: With the 2019 county cricket season over, keep up to date with the latest signings, departures and rumours for 2020.
results.shortTitle: County ins and outs
results.title: County ins & outs - signings, departures and rumours

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Essex are crowned county champions, while Somerset miss out again as the title decider ends in a dramatic draw at Taunton.
results.shortTitle: Essex win 2019 County Championship
results.title: Essex win County Championship: Draw with Somerset confirms 2019 title

thumbnail.altText: Essex opener Alastair Cook with the County Championship trophy

results.description: Gloucestershire and Northants players celebrate promotion to Division One of the County Championship after Glamorgan's draw with Durham sees both sides go up.
results.shortTitle: Watch Glos & Northants celebrate promotion
results.title: County Championship: Watch Gloucestershire and Northants players celebrate promotion to Division One

results.description: Surrey and Nottinghamshire draw their final Division One match of the season as no play is possible on the final day.
results.shortTitle: Wet outfield leads to Surrey-Notts draw
results.title: County Championship: Surrey and Nottinghamshire draw

results.description: Warwickshire and Yorkshire finish their Division One campaigns with a rain-hit draw at Edgbaston.
results.shortTitle: Bears and Yorkshire end season with draw
results.title: County Championship: Warwickshire and Yorkshire end season with rain-hit draw

results.description: Surrey and England batsman Ollie Pope makes his eighth first-class hundred, but their game against Notts looks set for a draw.
results.shortTitle: England's Pope hits ton for Surrey
results.title: County Championship: Ollie Pope hits century for Surrey against Notts

results.description: Essex are set to win their eighth County Championship as a day three washout means their game with Somerset should end in a draw.
results.shortTitle: Essex close in on title after washout
results.title: County Championship: Essex close to title after day three washout at Taunton

results.description: Rain and sodden outfields causes major disruption in the County Championship once again on Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Rain disrupts Championship schedule again
results.title: County Championship: Five games abandoned on Wednesday

results.description: Relive day four of the final round of County Championship games as Essex won the title and Gloucestershire and Northants secured promotion.
results.shortTitle: County Championship - Essex win County Championship after dramatic draw at Somerset
results.title: County Championship latest - day four as it happened

results.description: Somerset keep their title hopes alive as a last-wicket stand of 59 takes them past 200 against Essex on a second rain-hit day.
results.shortTitle: Somerset cling on to title hopes
results.title: County Championship: Somerset edge past 200 against Essex

results.description: Heavy rain badly affects Tuesday's County Championship, with four games abandoned without a ball bowled.
results.shortTitle: Rain affects second day of Championship
results.title: County Championship: No play possible in four games on Tuesday

results.description: Just two overs are possible on day two of Surrey's Championship match against Nottinghamshire, as rain hits The Oval.
results.shortTitle: Only two overs bowled between Surrey & Notts
results.title: County Championship: Rain disrupts Surrey v Nottinghamshire

results.description: Relive day three of the latest County Championship games as it happened, with no play possible between Somerset and Essex.
results.shortTitle: County Championship - Surrey declare against Notts, no play at Taunton
results.title: County Championship - day three as it happened

results.description: With the county season just about finished for 2019, who did BBC Sport users choose as their best Championship XI?
results.shortTitle: Who is in your county team of the season?
results.title: County Championship: 2019 team of the season as chosen by BBC Sport users

results.description: Hampshire seamer Keith Barker takes 5-48 as 13 wickets fall on day one of their match against Kent in the County Championship.
results.shortTitle: 13 wickets fall on first day of Kent v Hampshire
results.title: County Championship: 13 wickets fall on first day of Kent v Hampshire

results.description: Tom Kohler-Cadmore's unbeaten century puts Yorkshire in command against Warwickshire as the Tykes aim to finish third.
results.shortTitle: Bears bruised by Kohler-Cadmore century
results.title: County Championship: Tom Kohler-Cadmore's first-day ton gives Yorkshire advantage

results.description: Rain washes out the final two sessions of Somerset's title decider against Essex, with the hosts struggling on 75-4 at Taunton.
results.shortTitle: Somerset struggling against Essex
results.title: County Championship: Somerset slump to 75-4 against Essex before rain arrives

results.description: Ollie Pope marks his England call-up with 78 not out for Surrey against relegated Nottinghamshire at The Oval.
results.shortTitle: Pope & Borthwick put Surrey in charge
results.title: County Championship: Ollie Pope & Scott Borthwick put Surrey in charge against Notts

results.description: Relive day two as it happened in the final Championship games of the summer as Essex's Simon Harmer takes 5-105 against Somerset.
results.shortTitle: County Championship - Somerset still in title hunt despite rain
results.title: County Championship latest - day two as it happened

results.description: Somerset and Essex will go head-to-head to win the County Championship title from Monday at Taunton.
results.shortTitle: Somerset & Essex set for Championship decider
results.title: County Championship: Somerset and Essex set for Taunton title decider

thumbnail.altText: Tom Abell and Ryan ten Doeschate
